data.name: Adam Warlock
data.description: Guardian of the Soul Stone, Adam Warlock prevents his Infinity Watch allies' positive effects from being cleared or flipped.

starItems.name: Adam Warlock
starItems.description: Guardian of the Soul Stone, Adam Warlock prevents his Infinity Watch allies' positive effects from being cleared or flipped.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage.
Prolong the duration of all negative effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> and <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, by <color=#86e619>1</color>.

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage.
Prolong the duration of all negative effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> and <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, by <color=#86e619>1</color>.

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage.
Prolong the duration of all negative effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> and <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, by <color=#86e619>1</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to primary target

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.
Prolong the duration of all negative effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> and <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, by <color=#86e619>1</color>.
Apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to the primary target.

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage.
Prolong the duration of all negative effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> and <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, by <color=#86e619>1</color>.
Apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to the primary target.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to primary target

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>290%</color> damage.
Prolong the duration of all negative effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> and <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, by <color=#86e619>1</color>.
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to the primary target.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>350%</color> damage.
Prolong the duration of all negative effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> and <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, by <color=#86e619>1</color>.
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to the primary target.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>.

This attack is Unavoidable.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to all enemy <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> <color=#fff568>PROTECTORS</color>

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>.
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to all enemy <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> <color=#fff568>PROTECTORS</color>.

This attack is Unavoidable.

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>.
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to all enemy <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> <color=#fff568>PROTECTORS</color>.

This attack is Unavoidable.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
Always apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to all enemy <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> <color=#fff568>PROTECTORS</color>

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>.
Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to all enemy <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> <color=#fff568>PROTECTORS</color>.

This attack is Unavoidable.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to all enemy <color=#fff568>PROTECTORS</color>

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>.
Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to all enemy <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> <color=#fff568>PROTECTORS</color>.
Apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to all enemy <color=#fff568>PROTECTORS</color>.

This attack is Unavoidable.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>80%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to primary target and all enemy <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> <color=#fff568>PROTECTORS</color>

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>380%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to all enemy <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> <color=#fff568>PROTECTORS</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
Apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to all enemy <color=#fff568>PROTECTORS</color>.

This attack is Unavoidable.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>120%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to all enemy <color=#fff568>PROTECTORS</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>500%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to all enemy <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> <color=#fff568>PROTECTORS</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
Apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to all enemy <color=#fff568>PROTECTORS</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

This attack is Unavoidable.

1.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>. Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> target within <color=#86e619>2</color> spaces of the primary target for <color=#86e619>70%</color> damage.

This attack can Chain to <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> targets.
This attack cannot be counterattacked.

2.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>. Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> target within <color=#86e619>2</color> spaces of the primary target for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage.

This attack can Chain to <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> targets.
This attack cannot be counterattacked.

3.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>. Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> target within <color=#86e619>2</color> spaces of the primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.

This attack can Chain to <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> targets.
This attack cannot be counterattacked.

4.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>. Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> target within <color=#86e619>2</color> spaces of the primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.

This attack can Chain to <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> targets.
This attack cannot be counterattacked.

5.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>. Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> target within <color=#86e619>2</color> spaces of the primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage.

This attack can Chain to <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> targets.
This attack cannot be counterattacked.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage on all attacks
Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to secondary target

6.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>350%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>. Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> target within <color=#86e619>2</color> spaces of the primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.

This attack can Chain to <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> targets.
This attack cannot be counterattacked.

7.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>420%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>. Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> target within <color=#86e619>2</color> spaces of the primary target for <color=#86e619>370%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.

This attack can Chain to <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> targets.
This attack cannot be counterattacked.

1.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies.

If Health is full at the start of a match, Revive once with <color=#86e619>60%</color> of this character's Max Health. On Revive gain <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> + <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> + <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, then clear all negative effects from self and all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies.

On Turn, clear <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> from all enemies. If any enemy had <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to the most injured ally.
When this character or any <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> ally gains <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> to that character.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health.
1.nextUpgrade:
When this character drops below <color=#86e619>20%</color> Health, gain <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Armor
<color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Armor

2.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies.

If Health is full at the start of a match, Revive once with <color=#86e619>60%</color> of this character's Max Health. On Revive gain <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> + <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> + <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, then clear all negative effects from self and all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies.

On Turn, clear <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> from all enemies. If any enemy had <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to the most injured ally.

When this character drops below <color=#86e619>20%</color> Health, gain <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.
When this character or any <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> ally gains <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> to that character.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health.
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Armor. <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Armor.
2.nextUpgrade:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies
When this character drops below <color=#86e619>20%</color> Health, gain <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health for self and all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies

3.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> + <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies.

If Health is full at the start of a match, Revive once with <color=#86e619>60%</color> of this character's Max Health. On Revive gain <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> + <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> + <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, then clear all negative effects from self and all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies.

On Turn, clear <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> from all enemies. If any enemy had <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to the most injured ally.

When this character drops below <color=#86e619>20%</color> Health, gain <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> + <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>.
When this character or any <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> ally gains <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> to that character.

Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health.
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Armor. <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Armor.
3.nextUpgrade:
Lower Damage by <color=#86e619>10%</color> for all enemies
Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Armor for self and all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies

4.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> + <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies.

If Health is full at the start of a match, Revive once with <color=#86e619>60%</color> of this character's Max Health. On Revive gain <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> + <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> + <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, then clear all negative effects from self and all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies.

On Turn, clear <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> from all enemies. If any enemy had <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to the most injured ally.

When this character drops below <color=#86e619>20%</color> Health, gain <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> + <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>.
When this character or any <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> ally gains <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> to that character.

If this character has <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies, lower Damage by <color=#86e619>10%</color> for all enemies.
Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health.
Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Armor. <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Armor.
4.nextUpgrade:
When this character drops below <color=#86e619>20%</color> Health, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health for self and all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies

5.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> + <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies.

If Health is full at the start of a match, Revive once with <color=#86e619>60%</color> of this character's Max Health. On Revive gain <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> + <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> + <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, then clear all negative effects from self and all <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies.

On Turn, clear <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> from all enemies. If any enemy had <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to the most injured ally.

When this character drops below <color=#86e619>20%</color> Health, gain <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> + <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> + <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>.
When this character or any <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> ally gains <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> to that character.

If this character has <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies, lower Damage by <color=#86e619>10%</color> for all enemies.
Gain  <color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health.
Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Armor. <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Armor.
